name: PeerMe MultiSig: Deposit
title: Deposit funds to MultiSig
description: Deposit EGLD or ESDT tokens to a MultiSig wallet. This allows the MultiSig to receive funds even if marked as unpayable. Funds can later be transferred via proposals.

inputs.name: Amount
inputs.description: The amount of EGLD or ESDT tokens to deposit.

messages.success: Funds deposited successfully to the MultiSig wallet.

body.en: Funds have been successfully deposited to the MultiSig wallet
body.de: Guthaben wurde erfolgreich auf die MultiSig-Wallet eingezahlt
